name: Super Off Road: The Baja
overview: Strap on your helmet, climb into your vehicle and challenge the toughest racecourse known to man! Super Off Road, The Baja will put you in the thick of desert racing at it's best! Take on World Champ, Ivan Stewart and other competitors as you race in The Mexico 250, The Ensenada 500 and the Granddaddy of them all, The Baja 1000! 8 separate legs - each patterned after the actual Baja racecourse! Dramatic 3-D perspective makes those big hills, bumps and jumps so real you can feel em! Make Pit Stops and customize your vehicle for all-out performance! Killer sound and awesome graphics for 1 or 2 players! Super Off Road, The Baja: After you cross the finish line, you'll be dusting yourself off!
